Publication Abstract: The interplay of positive and negative interactions between drug-sensitive and resistant cells influences the effectiveness of treatment in heterogeneous cancer cell populations. Here, we study interactions between estrogen receptor-positive breast cancer cell lineages that are sensitive and resistant to ribociclib-induced cyclin-dependent kinase 4 and 6 (CDK4/6) inhibition. Publication Title: Phylogenetic inference from single-cell RNA-seq data
Publication Authors: Xuan Liu, Jason I Griffiths, Isaac Bishara, Jiayi Liu, Andrea H Bild, Jeffrey T Chang
Publication Abstract: Tumors are comprised of subpopulations of cancer cells that harbor distinct genetic profiles and phenotypes that evolve over time and during treatment. By reconstructing the course of cancer evolution, we can understand the acquisition of the malignant properties that drive tumor progression.
